attributes.title: Do not download it hacks your phone
attributes.review: The app starts off by asking you if you would vote for Donald Trump if you say no it downloads or hack onto your phone and also gives you a personal message on why you should vote for Trump this is against my privacy and I do not recommend this for anyone, and I can’t believe that Donald Trump is trying to ban TickTock we will fight back and you will pay for this

attributes.title: Help I’m blind now😭
attributes.review: I opened the app just to see the smallest snail on the most organgest Cheeto you could ever see! I didn’t realize until it was to late...that that was no snail indeed..it-it-it was no I can’t it’s to painful to think about 😭🐌🍊 instead I’m going to tell you that if u put orange on more orange and maybe add a bit more hair and maybe a little more intelligentness to the “great” Cheeto then people might like it better

attributes.title: Please take down this app
attributes.review: This app is literally the worst. I opened it and it literally was a picture of a Cheeto looking like it was gonna cry. This app is promoting Cheeto abuse and is very disturbing to say the least. Please take this app down it is not good for the community or good app to be in the App Store. If it at all matters I think it shows how you look for having such a horrible app available. Please take this under consideration.

attributes.title: Worst Quality App Yet
attributes.review: This app load so slowly and I know it’s not my internet because my other apps work fine. Also the color scheme really isn’t doing it for me. If people want to improve this app I really think they need to start over from square one. There’s nothing really worth keeping. As Sharpay once said, “out with the old, in with the new” and honey... we need something new.

attributes.title: All “🟧” lives matter ✨
attributes.review: As i was trying to open the app , i got a red button to press but it didnt do anything. I tried calling the help line but they all said that they were too busy killing black people so i did what any normal person would do and i reported it to the president of mexico , he then said that i should write an amazing review for the best president ever. Next time President, ask canada for their help.

attributes.title: This app only spreads negativity
attributes.review:
The great American flag
Is wrapped and dragged with explosives
Compulsive disorder, sons and daughters
Barricaded blocks and borders
Look what you taught us
It's murder on my street, your street, back streets
Wall street, corporate offices, banks
Employees and bosses with homicidal thoughts
Donald Trump's in office, we lost Barack
And promised to never doubt him again
But is America honest or do we bask in sin?
Pass the gin, I mix it with American blood
Then bash him in, you crippin' or you married to blood?
I'll ask again—oops—accident
It's nasty when you set us up
Then roll the dice, then bet us up
You overnight the big rifles, then tell Fox to be scared of us
Gang members or terrorists, et cetera, et cetera
Americas reflections of me
That's what a mirror does

attributes.title: I WISH I could give it a zero
attributes.review: This app kept glitching and would only turn on for a few seconds before it froze my whole phone 😡😡😡 My phone eventually had to be shut down for TWO days until I could turn it on again😢 Even after that my phone was still freezing and now I think it is possessed by an orange Cheeto.😩😈😈0/10 do NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever!
attributes.review: This app doesn’t open! It just glitches and freezes. I’ve deleted it and downloaded it multiple times but it just won’t work?! How will I get more information from an app that doesn’t work? Glitchy software like this doesn’t belong on the AppStore! How can I trust anything else on the AppStore when even a political information app hurts the performance of my phone?!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: When I was opening the app it kept on crashing and I restarted my whole phone and it still didn’t  work. Then I reset my router and the app still was incapable of loading. Lastly, I went to the apple store to have them verify that my phone is working and that the app itself was the problem. It makes me sad that I can’t support my president through his own app. 😘✨💞

attributes.title: this app gave me gonorrhea :((((((((
attributes.review: as a US citizen i decided i had to see what this app was like, and i regret this decision more than anything else in my entire life. the app downloaded fine, but just moments after opening it and clicking a single button, i felt a horrible pain in my lower abdomen and started vomiting violently, working up a fever of 105. after heading to the doctor, i found out it was gonorrhea:( THANKS A LOT TRUMP
